name: prefix
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: prefix
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a letter or group of letters added to the beginning of a word to make a new word

example.eg: In the word "unimportant", "un-" is a prefix.
example.egtrans: 在单词 unimportant 中，un- 是前缀。

dsense.name: prefix
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.
